name: EEDAR
tag_list: video-games, research, analyst, investment, finance, entertainment
overview:
Founded in 2006 by video game industry veterans, EEDAR is the largest specialty video game research firm in the world.

Leveraging a proprietary database of over 100 million internally researched data points from more than 50,000 physical and digital video game products, EEDAR is the sole provider of end-to-end integrated data analysis solutions that allow for the examination of every factor influencing the success of past, present, and future video game titles.

EEDAR supplies data, technology and consulting services to leading companies associated with the video game industry.

EEDAR’s video game meta-data offerings are the most comprehensive available, powering numerous leading retail and web search outlets.

EEDAR’s technology services comprise the only contextual analytics platform available today. GamePulse is utilized by 100% of the top global publishers to enrich their multitude of measurement data sources with proprietary systems to align and segment correlative investigations. Additionally, the company maintains a highly scalable and unique discovery and recommendation service for entertainment that leverages their rich product database and supports cross-media queries.

EEDAR’s services division provides a full gamut of offerings including traditional custom research, portfolio analysis, sales forecasting, outsourced financial data management, expert testimony and much more. EEDAR is the only SSAE16/SOC1 Type II compliant firm offering services tailored to digital video game revenue data management.

EEDAR is based in Carlsbad, California and has been recognized by Forbes Magazine as one of America’s Most Promising Companies and also holds the Guinness world record for the largest collection of videogame facts and information.
